page.description: Clicking the [...] next to this property opens the Tree Control - JSON Data dialog. This dialog comes with a workspace where you can enter JSON directly. There are also three text buttons at the bottom of the dialog. Validate JSON examines any entered JSON for errors and Show in JSON Viewer gives a rough visual of the existing tree structure.
